text: Hi! My name is Justin Kang and I'm a University student studying computer science at Cornell. This is my personal website, built on React and hosted on Heroku!
I've always had an interest in computers, breaking them apart to find out what happens on the inside, and didn't gain an interest into software until my first year at college.
alt: a picture of a broken down computer I used to further my pursuit of knowledge

text: Now, after three full years of studying computer science, I seek to use my abilities to create new products, innovate on past tools, and help out both the local and global community that surrounds me
Some hobbies I have are: playing guitar, making mechanical keyboards, and trying my best to make food that I enjoy eating!
